DOC.brief_summary: In this the investigators will be comparing the effects of Laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy with intensive medical management on weight and metabolic parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy and Intensive Medical Management in Obese Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Intensive medical management will include 1. VLCD 2. Physical activity 3. Exenatide 4. Metformin 5. Insulin detemir
